detailsData.title: Full-Service Lawyer
detailsData.content: No matter where I’ve been in my legal career, I’ve always been the 'full-service' lawyer for whatever product development projects I’ve been part of. Negotiating and redlining contracts, writing customer terms and conditions, and working with marketing teams are just a few examples.

detailsData.title: Payments Expertise
detailsData.content: Along the way, I’ve picked up a bunch of payments expertise. This includes FinTech bank partnerships, mobile wallets, P2P payments, and more.

detailsData.title: Regulatory Experience
detailsData.content: I have extensive experience with various regulations such as Regulation E, Regulation P, and BSA/AML. This includes customer identification programs, suspicious activity reporting, and beneficial ownership rules.

detailsData.title: Operational Perspective
detailsData.content: I break down cryptic regulatory compliance requirements into operationalized bite-sized requirements. This helps in making something work from both a legal, business, and operational perspective.

address: 323 Washington Avenue North, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55401
subHeading: It’s time to disrupt the ordinary.
valueProp: There’s no such thing as a typical business, but the market is brimming with typical law firms. Rest assured, this law firm isn’t one of them. Your business needs to move fast and expand the law to keep pace with an ever-growing surge of innovation, and I’m here to help you lead the way.
topics: Visa Direct and Mastercard Send Real-Time Payments

testimonalData.text: Axell Law provided exceptional service and expertise in navigating complex regulatory requirements.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Their full-service approach and deep understanding of payments made our product launch seamless.
